languages.text: "Он это... свидетелем был. Так что я его сначала сглазил, а потом... тоже прикончил!"
"Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
languages.original_text: "Он это... свидетелем был. Так что я его сначала сглазил, а потом... тоже прикончил!"

traits.locale_text: "Well, that's because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
"Well, that's because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
"Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
"Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
"Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
"Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

languages.text: « Ben... parce qu'il avait tout vu. Il aurait pu me dénoncer. Alors, j'ai commencé par le maudire, et puis... je lui ai réglé son compte à lui aussi ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

traits.locale_text: « Ben... parce qu'il avait tout vu. Il aurait pu me dénoncer. Alors, j'ai commencé par le maudire, et puis... je lui ai réglé son compte à lui aussi ! »

languages.text: «Pues, porque... me vio hacerlo. Era testigo. Así que lo maldije y... ¡lo maté también!».
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

traits.locale_text: «Pues, porque... me vio hacerlo. Era testigo. Así que lo maldije y... ¡lo maté también!».

languages.text: “呃，因为……因为他看到了我。他目击了这场凶杀，于是我诅咒了他，然后把……把他也杀了！”
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

traits.locale_text: “呃，因为……因为他看到了我。他目击了这场凶杀，于是我诅咒了他，然后把……把他也杀了！”

languages.text: 「それは…彼が私を見てしまったからです。目撃者、だったんです。なので彼を呪い、そして…殺しました！」
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

traits.locale_text: 「それは…彼が私を見てしまったからです。目撃者、だったんです。なので彼を呪い、そして…殺しました！」

languages.text: "Na ja, weil ... er mich gesehen hat. Ein Zeuge war er. Also habe ich ihn zuerst verflucht und dann ... habe ich ihn auch getötet!"
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, weil ... er mich gesehen hat. Ein Zeuge war er. Also habe ich ihn zuerst verflucht und dann ... habe ich ihn auch getötet!"

languages.text: "Çünkü, şey... Beni yaparken gördü. Tanıktı işte. Ben de önce onu lanetledim, sonra... Onu da öldürüverdim!"
languages.original_text: "Well, because... he saw me do it. A witness, he was. So I cursed him first, and then... I killed him too!"
